Translations.Text: Mazima abakkiriza beebo abakkiriza Katonda n'omubakawe era bwe baba naye ku nsonga ebakwatako bonna tebayinza kuvaawo okugyako nga bamaze kumusaba, mazima abo abakusaba okubakkiriza bagende, abo beebo abakkiriza Katonda n'omubakawe, kale bwe baba bakusabye olw'ezimu ku nsonga zaabwe wa olukusa oyo gwoba oyagadde mu bo era osabe Katonda abawe ekisonyiwo, mazima Katonda musonyiyi nnyo musaasizi

Temufuulanga engeri gye mukoowoola omubaka nga engeri gye mwekoowoolamu mwekka na mwekka, mazima Katonda amanyi abo abeemulula mu mmwe nga bebbirira, abo abaawukana ku kigambokye bateekeddwa okutya okuba nga batuukwako okugezesebwa oba ebibonerezo ebiruma ennyo

Abange, mazima bya Katonda yekka ebiri mu ggulu omusanvu n'ensi, mazima amanya ekyo kye mubaako era amanyi olunaku lwe baliddizibwa gyali olwonno abategeeze bye bakola era Katonda amanyidde ddala ebikwata ku buli kintu
